#labels Featured,Phase-Support
===初始化配置指南===
====1. 服务器端 (web.xml)====
最简配置：
{{{
<servlet>
    <servlet-name>actionServlet</servlet-name>
    <servlet-class>com.googlecode.rcpstruts.server.ActionServlet</servlet-class>
    <load-on-startup>1</load-on-startup>
</servlet>
<servlet-mapping>
    <servlet-name>actionServlet</servlet-name>
    <url-pattern>*.data</url-pattern>
</servlet-mapping>
<!--AND/OR:-->
<servlet-mapping>
    <servlet-name>actionServlet</servlet-name>
    <url-pattern>*.json</url-pattern>
</servlet-mapping>
<!--AND/OR:-->
<servlet-mapping>
    <servlet-name>actionServlet</servlet-name>
    <url-pattern>*.page</url-pattern>
</servlet-mapping>
}}}
可选配置：
{{{
<servlet>
    <servlet-name>actionServlet</servlet-name>
    <servlet-class>com.googlecode.rcpstruts.server.ActionServlet</servlet-class>
    <init-param>
        <param-name>actionFactory</param-name>
        <param-value>
            <!--DEFAULT:-->
            com.googlecode.rcpstruts.server.factory.SpringActionFactory
            <!--OPTIONAL:-->
            <!--com.googlecode.rcpstruts.server.factory.GuiceActionFactory-->
            <!--com.googlecode.rcpstruts.server.factory.PropertiesActionFactory-->
            <!--com.googlecode.rcpstruts.server.factory.ClassActionFactory-->
        </param-value>
    </init-param>
    <init-param>
        <param-name>serializers</param-name>
        <param-value>
            <!--DEFAULT:-->
            data: com.googlecode.rcpstruts.util.serializer.JavaSerializer,
            json: com.googlecode.rcpstruts.server.serializer.JsonSerializer,
            page: com.googlecode.rcpstruts.server.serializer.JspSerializer
            <!--OPTIONAL:-->
            <!--data: com.googlecode.rcpstruts.util.serializer.JBossSerializer-->
            <!--data: com.googlecode.rcpstruts.util.serializer.JsonSerializer-->
            <!--data: com.googlecode.rcpstruts.util.serializer.XmlSerializer-->
            <!--data: com.googlecode.rcpstruts.util.serializer.XStreamSerializer-->
            <!--page: com.googlecode.rcpstruts.server.serializer.CommonTemplateSerializer-->
            <!--page: com.googlecode.rcpstruts.server.serializer.FreeMarkerSerializer-->
            <!--page: com.googlecode.rcpstruts.server.serializer.VelocitySerializer-->
        </param-value>
    </init-param>
    <load-on-startup>1</load-on-startup>
</servlet>
<servlet-mapping>
    <servlet-name>actionServlet</servlet-name>
    <url-pattern>*.data</url-pattern>
</servlet-mapping>
<servlet-mapping>
    <servlet-name>actionServlet</servlet-name>
    <url-pattern>*.json</url-pattern>
</servlet-mapping>
<servlet-mapping>
    <servlet-name>actionServlet</servlet-name>
    <url-pattern>*.page</url-pattern>
</servlet-mapping>
}}}
Spring配置：(参见：[http://www.springframework.org])
{{{
<context-param>
    <param-name>contextConfigLocation</param-name>
    <param-value>classpath*:beans.xml</param-value>
</context-param>
<listener>
    <listener-class>org.springframework.web.context.ContextLoaderListener</listener-class>
</listener>
}}}
====2. 客户端 (transport.properties)====
最简配置：
{{{
server.host=127.0.0.1
server.port=8080
context.path=xxx
}}}
可选配置：
{{{
transporter=com.googlecode.rcpstruts.client.transport.HttpURLConnectionTransporter
#transporter=com.googlecode.rcpstruts.client.transport.CommonsHttpClientTransporter
#transporter=com.googlecode.rcpstruts.client.transport.HttpClientTransporter
serializer=com.googlecode.rcpstruts.util.serialize.JavaSerializer
#serializer=com.googlecode.rcpstruts.util.serialize.JBossSerializer
#serializer=com.googlecode.rcpstruts.util.serialize.JsonSerializer
#serializer=com.googlecode.rcpstruts.util.serialize.XmlSerializer
#serializer=com.googlecode.rcpstruts.util.serialize.XStreamSerializer
listeners=com.xxx.XXXListener,com.yyy.YYYListener
server.host=127.0.0.1
server.port=8080
context.path=xxx
action.suffix=data
connection.timeout=30000
socket.timeout=0
connection.check.interval=5000
}}}
